official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to allow Federal employees to take paid leave for duty in the Civil Air Patrol.

summary.text: Entitles full-time Federal employees up to seven days of paid leave each year for performing duties as a volunteer member of the Civil Air Patrol.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to allow Federal employees to take paid leave for duty in the Civil Air Patrol.
